channel.title: Please, someone give me a real answer
channel.description:
What are some reasons that the moparscape server status checker would say my server is offline?
What I've done:
1.) I have portforwarded to this computer using 43594 (should I use the ip address of my server instead of this computer?) 2.) I have made a host on no-ip called fiammascape.no-ip.biz and on the DUC 3.0 it has 3 check marks next to the statuses of what is on there.

item.title: Please, someone give me a real answer
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.source: Please, someone give me a real answer

item.title: Please, someone give me a real answer
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

NOONE CARES! WHEN YOU TRIPLE POST YOU PISS PEOPLE OFF! CHECK YOUR SERVER WHEN IT IS RUNNING AND SEE IF IT SAYS “Running on ip 0.0.0.0:43594” OR WHATEVER! STOP REPOSTING!

Read full topic
